mention.text: a receptionist who tried to stop him
riva , 47 , of sterling heights and steinberg , 48 , of macomb county 's bruce township
charges of first - degree murder , intent to murder , possession of a firearm in the commission of a felony and fleeing and eluding police
first - degree murder , intent to murder , possession of a firearm in the commission of a felony and fleeing and eluding police
the judge if he understood the charges against him and if he was aware that he could be sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole if convicted of first - degree murder
a general accountant at the firm

the families of the wounded men
our employees for their bravery on monday
